ComicInfo.Summary: If variety is the spice of life, this is one spicy issue! First up, award-winning writer/artist Paul Chadwick returns to the pages of the book that launched his most famous creation: Concrete! Next, writer Ed Brubaker and artist Eric Shanower present part two of "An Accidental Death." A girl is missing, and only two teenage boys know the guilty secret behind her disappearance. Finally, the Doctor may be in, but he's definitelyway out! Dr. Giggles operates as only he can. Scripted by writer/director Manny Coto and illustrated by Alan J. Burrows, Dr. Giggles prepares to leap onto the silver screen in the film of the same name from Dark Horse and Largo Entertainment! Front cover by Paul Chadwick, back cover by Doug Mahnke (The Mask).
ComicInfo.Title: Byrdland's Secret; Genetic Defects; Overheard While I Was Supposed to be Working
ComicInfo.Writer: Ed Brubaker,Eddie Campbell,Manny Coto,Paul Chadwick,Paul Chadwick,Manny Coto,Ed Brubaker,Eddie Campbell
